channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.K. faces diplomatic headache with China as President Xi turns up the heat on $327 million plan for lavish new London embassy
item.description: Already rejected by local officials due to its location adjacent to the iconic Tower Bridge, the leader of China has now raised the embassy issue dire...

item.title: Ukraine kills top Russian general in Moscow it accuses of chemical weapons crimes
item.description: A top Russian general was assassinated in Moscow by Ukraine's SBU intelligence service on Tuesday morning.

item.title: UK kicks off review into training AI models on copyrighted content
item.description: The U.K. government said Tuesday it's consulting on measures to regulate the use of copyrighted content by tech companies to train their AI models.

item.title: Worried about stock market stability in 2025? Here are investors’ biggest fears.
How Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy teamed up to gut $2T in federal spending
Germany’s auto giants were already reeling. Now Trump wants to turn them into American companies
item.description: For Germany, the prospect of U.S. tariffs on European autos comes at a time when it's top original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) are already reeling.

item.title: The world’s busiest airline routes in 2024 are largely in Asia
item.description: The Hong Kong to Taipei route is once again the world’s busiest international flight route—a title it last claimed in 2019.

item.title: U.S. stocks end mostly higher, with Nasdaq notching record closing high
Microsoft’s CEO may have just said something worrying about Nvidia
Temu tops U.S. iOS downloads for second year running amid greater scrutiny of China companies
item.description: Apple ranked Temu as the top free app on its U.S. iOS store for the second year running even as Chinese companies face greater U.S. government scrutin...

item.title: Russia’s chemical weapons chief killed in Moscow blast
item.description: Igor Kirillov was the most senior military figure assassinated in Russia yet as the Kremlin's campaign in Ukraine drags on.

item.title: Nvidia falls deeper into correction territory as Broadcom rally continues
item.description: Despite Nvidia's recent fall, its stock is still up more than 160% for the year. Broadcom has risen more than 120% in the same time frame.

item.title: Job-hopping vs. staying at one company: What’s the best route to the corner office?
item.description: There are benefits and drawbacks to staying at one company if you’re a CEO aspirant.

item.title: From Red Lobster to Starbucks: How ‘CEO sprinters’ reach the corner office in record time
item.description: Leaders who become CEOs in record time all share three career catalysts.

item.title: How Chewy’s stock is shedding its meme-stock past amid strong execution
